mapper.update: update operatelog set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_role = #{userRole,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_ip = #{userIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, handle_time = #{handleTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, handle_module = #{handleModule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, handle_type = #{handleType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, context = #{context,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, user_name, user_role, user_ip, handle_time, handle_module, handle_type, context from operatelog where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, user_id, user_name, user_role, user_ip, handle_time, handle_module, handle_type, context from operatelog
